text: Mahendra Bhatt is an Indian politician and member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. Bhatt was a member of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly from the Nandaprayag constituency in Chamoli district.My Neta == References == Category:People from Uttarkashi district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttarakhand Category:Members of the Uttarakhand Legislative Assembly Category:Living people Category:Uttarakhand MLAs 2017– Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mahendra Bhatt
